column2: Madisonians differ from mainstream Americanism in that they consider the judicary the supreme branch of the government. Legends of Justices of the Supreme Court fighting against tyrannical Presidents and Congressmen have filled them with a conviction that a Chief Justice of the Supreme Court is the superior authority on all matters spiritual and temporal.
If I am pious enough and control Rome, I can create a Fraticelli Pope to serve as the head of the faith in opposition to the vile Catholic Pope.
The Holy Father has lost control of his secular domain, but it is within my power to restore the Eternal City to him!

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. This has given me an opportunity to create a Fraticelli Papacy, which shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to create a Fraticelly Papacy, claiming it shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

I have granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
This judge is probably next in line for a Justiceship when one becomes available.
Of all the judges in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Justice by the Chief Justice.
The Senior Justice of the Supreme Court is the judge next in line to become Chief Justice
A war over the [Root.GetConclaveName], and what is the righteous way forward for the faith.
Impious [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] won the war for the [Root.GetConclaveName]
By not seeking legitimacy directly from the [Root.GetConclaveName], your inauguration will §ROffend§! the §Y[Root.GetProperReligiousHead]§!.
Write a letter to [Root.GetProperReligiousHead], asking them to inaugurate you as [Root.GetTitle].

To the Illuminating [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] donates a sizable sum of money to [Root.GetProperReligiousHead]'s preservation efforts as a show of [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
Now that I have the [Root.GetProperReligiousHead] to officiate my inauguration, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
This ruler was inaugurated by [Root.GetCrownedByDesc].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].

To the Illustrious [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by organizing a private feast in honor of an ardent servant of Justice such as I am.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]

To the Patriotic [Root.GetTitledName],\nI shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by donating the [scoped_artifact.GetName] [Root.GetSheHe] holds for the good of all patriots.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Judicary is no servant to any ruler, but to blind and fair Justice, equal and independent for all. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Order is no servant to any earthly ruler, but to our illustrious Lady. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
[Root.GetProperReligiousHead] or not, you are still my vassal.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a one-time increase to the budget of the Judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a donation to [From.GetHLGroupName]. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you officially proclaim that it is no business of the [Root.GetTitle] to appoint members of the judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you prove your devotion to [From.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] by waging war against a most criminal ruler whose wickedness made worthy of official censure. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, but first, let us celebrate this joyous occasion with a lavish feast. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made good use of my money: the mansion has been filled to the brim with wine and whores. Soon after the start of the celebration for my upcoming coronation, the crowd of lechers and drunks invited to the party are already debasing themselves in the most abominable acts imaginable.

When my guards come to recover me in the morning, I barely remember anything of what has happened last night. I am fairly certain to remember, amongst other things, seeing [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crown me on top of a fountain of wine, as naked as on the day [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] was born.

Militarism is a splinter Americanist movement that formed as a consequence of the death of President Wyatt Kelleher at the hands of the Deitsch. Finding inspiration in the legends of America's ancient heroes: The United States Military, the Militarists have denounced the Post-Event Presidency as a pathetic farce, and sworn that they shall one day reunite America, by fire and sword if need be.
